messages.content: List reports about climate change

function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT lv.symbol, lv.proper_title, lv.title, lv.entity, lv.un_body, lv.publication_date, rf.calculated_frequency
FROM latest_versions lv
LEFT JOIN report_frequencies rf ON lv.proper_title = rf.proper_title
WHERE 'CLIMATE CHANGE' = ANY(lv.subject_terms)
ORDER BY lv.publication_date DESC;","explanation":"List the latest SG report series tagged with CLIMATE CHANGE, including frequency and publication details."}

function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT rf.proper_title, lv.symbol, lv.un_body, lv.effective_year FROM report_frequencies rf
JOIN latest_versions lv ON rf.proper_title = lv.proper_title
WHERE rf.calculated_frequency = 'annual'
ORDER BY lv.un_body, rf.proper_title;","explanation":"List all reports with calculated frequency 'annual', including their latest symbol, UN body, and effective year."}

args.query:
SELECT rf.proper_title, lv.symbol, lv.un_body, lv.effective_year FROM report_frequencies rf
JOIN latest_versions lv ON rf.proper_title = lv.proper_title
WHERE rf.calculated_frequency = 'annual'
ORDER BY lv.un_body, rf.proper_title;

function.arguments:

  FROM sg_reports
) AS t

ORDER BY usage_count DESC
LIMIT 10;","explanation":"Counts how frequently each subject term appears across all SG reports and returns the top 10 most common terms."}
